<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Warning](/Feats.aspx?ID=505) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 186 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28) (Level 8)

**Trigger**
You are about to roll a Perception or Survival check for initiative.

</column>

---

You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger, granting them each a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this action gains either the visual or auditory trait, respectively.
name: Scout's Warning
